translations: 个人魅力，感召力；神赐的力量，神授的能力；非凡的领导力

sentences.sentence: The President has great personal charisma.
sentences.translation: 总统具有超凡的个人魅力。

sentences.sentence: He was elected to power on the strength of his charisma.
He has neither the policies nor the personal charisma to inspire people.
sentences.translation: 他既没有谋略也没有个人魅力去鼓舞人。
